revised_title: In-depth Study of Cerebellum Lesions and their Effects on Monkeys
tldr: This study investigates the effects of cerebellum lesions and their degenerations in monkeys, focusing on the disturbances of station, locomotion, and muscular strength. The research also examines the central relations of the 5th cranial nerve and the existence of efferent and afferent tracts within the cerebellum.
